extName.description: The name of the extension shown in the browser

extDescription.message: Synchroniser la couleur de vos ampoules Philips Hue lorsque vous êtes en réunion Google Meet.

statusInMeeting.description: Status when user is in a meeting

statusNotInMeeting.description: Status when user is not in a meeting

statusError.description: Status when there is an error checking meeting status

settingsSavedMessage.description: Message displayed when the color settings are saved

settingsBridgeSectionTitle.description: Title for the bridge connection section

settingsBridgeIpLabel.description: Label for the bridge IP address input field

settingsBridgeIpPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the bridge IP address input field

settingsBridgeIpHelp.description: Help text for the bridge IP address input field

settingsDiscovering.description: Status message when discovering the Hue bridge

settingsRediscoverBtn.description: Button text to rediscover the Hue Bridge

settingsClearBridgeBtn.description: Button text to clear the bridge settings

settingsBridgeCleared.message: Bridge réinitialisé. Cliquez sur Rechercher pour recommencer.
settingsBridgeCleared.description: Message displayed when the bridge settings are cleared

settingsAuthenticationHelp.message: Appuyez sur le bouton de votre Bridge Hue, puis cliquez sur Authentifier ci-dessous.
settingsAuthenticationHelp.description: Help text for the authentication section

settingsAuthenticateBtn.description: Button text to authenticate with the Hue Bridge

settingsPressButton.message: Appuyez sur le bouton de votre Bridge maintenant...
settingsPressButton.description: Instruction to press the button on the Hue bridge

settingsAuthenticationSuccess.description: Message displayed when authentication is successful

settingsAuthenticationSuccessShort.description: Short message displayed when authentication is successful

settingsLightSectionTitle.description: Title for the light selection section

settingsLightSelected.description: Message displayed when a light is selected

settingsColorSectionTitle.description: Title for the meeting light settings section

settingsColorLabel.description: Label for the color and brightness settings

settingsTestColorBtn.description: Button text to test the selected color

settingsLightRestored.description: Message displayed when the light has been restored

settingsSaveColorBtn.description: Button text to save the selected color

settingsNoBridgeFound.message: Aucun Bridge trouvé. Assurez-vous que votre Bridge est sur le même réseau.
settingsNoBridgeFound.description: Error message when no bridge is found

settingsBridgeIpInvalid.message: Adresse IP du Bridge reçue non valide
settingsBridgeIpInvalid.description: Error message when an invalid bridge IP is received

settingsBridgeIpInvalidMessage.description: Error message for invalid bridge IP

settingsBridgeIpInvalidFormat.description: Error message when the bridge IP address format is invalid

settingsBridgeIpMissing.message: Veuillez d'abord détecter ou saisir l'IP du Bridge
settingsBridgeIpMissing.description: Error message when trying to authenticate without a bridge IP

settingsLightNotConnected.description: Error message when not connected to the Hue bridge

settingsFailedToLoadLights.description: Error message when failing to load lights

settingsNotConfiguredError.message: Veuillez configurer le Bridge et la lumière d'abord
settingsNotConfiguredError.description: Error message when setup is incomplete

settingsFailedToGetLightState.message: Impossible de lire l'état actuel de la lumière
settingsFailedToGetLightState.description: Error message when failing to get the current state

settingsFailedToSetTestColor.message: Échec de l'application de la couleur de test
settingsFailedToSetTestColor.description: Error message when failing to set the test color

settingsPressButtonError.message: Appuyez sur le bouton de votre bridge et réessayez
settingsPressButtonError.description: Error message when the user hasn't pressed the button on the Hue bridge

settingsUnexpectedResponseError.description: Error message when the bridge returns an unexpected response

settingsConnectionFailedError.description: Error message when connection to the bridge fails
